All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Auction
Represents an auction object in the auction system.
The auction object is represented in the same way as in the CSV file
AuctionManager
Manager class that manages all actions involving auctions, e.g., opening an auction and placing a bid.
It also takes care of loading Auction and Bid objects into the Model
Bid
Represents a bid object in the auction system.
Category
Represents a category object in the auction system.
Item
Represents an item object in the auction system.
ItemImage
Represents an item image object in the auction system.
ItemManager
Manager class that manages all actions involving items, e.g., creation, modification and deletion of items and the corresponding images.
It also takes care of loading Category, Item and ItemManager objects into the Model
MainUI
Implements the main user interface.
Model
Model class, holding the list of all objects currently active in the system
ModelFactory
Singleton class for Model.
Persistence
Holds references to objects that the user of the system has selected through the user interface
PersistenceFactory
Singleton class for Persistence.
Regex
Contains regular expressions used for checking input values in BL
Seller
Represents a seller object in the auction system.
User
Represents a user object in the auction system.
UserManager
Manager class that manages all actions involving users, e.g., registration and login.
It also takes care of loading Userobjects into the Model
